root.title: saab scania issu 150 mln dlr eurobond
root.body: saab scania ab issu 150 mln dlr eurobond due april 2 1992 pay 7 3/4 pct price 101 3/4 pct lead manag morgan guaranti ltd say bond avail denomin 5,000 50,000 dlr list london payment date april 2 1992 fee compris 1 1/4 pct sell concess 5/8 pct manag underwrit combin list london
